task.title: Embed Custom HTML in Comments
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to embed custom HTML on your site.

step.cmd: Click the HTML embed button ( </> ) on the comment editor box to launch the HTML editor box.
step.info: This button is visible only to moderators and owners.

step.cmd: Paste your HTML code into the editor, and click OK. (A message will be displayed for any HTML validation errors.)
A preview of the output is displayed below the comment editor.
Click Post Comment to display the output in the stream.
